title: I’m Curious About What’s Popular!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hey, mind if I ask you something? Do NYC girls usually wear casual clothes like you, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Who knows? I think they just dress however they like. Are you a fashion geek or something, Kotori?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah! I love western-style clothes. I’d like to know what’s popular around the world.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ah, I see. Wanna see a pic of my sister? I think she’s pretty fashionable. Give me a moment.... Here, something like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Let me see.... Wow, you’re right! Those clothes are lovely~. Same for the shoes and the bag.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>But she’s surrounded by fashion stylists here. Her casual clothes are.... Found it, like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeeh!? So that’s how she usually dresses.... Ah, you’re in it too. Fufufu, I see you get along pretty well~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not really.... we’re normal.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Is that so? You called her fashionable, so I thought you loved her.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>T- that’s not true, though? I only said it because you were curious about NYC’s fashion!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, you’re right. I was the one who asked. Sorry, Mia-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>....Can you stop looking at me like that....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
